TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/ComboBox extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::ComboBox abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Contains a class that provides objects for the drop-down arrow of the combo box control. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ComboBox>類別提供的基礎所在<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ComboBox.DropDownButton>類別定義。 <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.ComboBox.DropDownButton> 提供一組屬性會傳回<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>每個狀態的下拉式方塊控制項的下拉箭號。 若要取得<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement>下拉式方塊的文字部分，請使用其中一種<xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.TextBox.TextEdit>屬性。
